import React from 'react'; const Controls = ({ onCompare, onClear, onSwap, onCopy, onExportTxt, onExportHtml, onExportMd, onExportPdf, onAIAnalysis, hasResults, isGeneratingAI, hfConfigured, groqConfigured }) => { return (
{groqConfigured ? '‚úÖ Groq AI Ready' : hfConfigured ? '‚úÖ HF API Ready' : '‚ö†Ô∏è Local Analysis Only'}
); }; export default Controls;
